affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
attrib:
DURATION: 5
ARMOR LOSS: 1/1.4/1.8/2.2
BASE MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MOVE SLOW PER STACK: 3%/6%/9%/12%
STACK LIMIT: 4
cmb:
30/30/30/30
1.50
lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
name: bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
attrib:
RADIUS: 625
QUILL BASE DAMAGE: 20/40/60/80
QUILL STACK DAMAGE: 30/32/34/36
STACK DURATION: 14
MAX DAMAGE: 400
cmb:
35/35/35/35
3
lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
name: bristleback_quill_spray

desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 250 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
notes:
Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.
Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.
lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
name: bristleback_bristleback

desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
notes:
Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.
Items will not trigger Warpath.
attrib:
DAMAGE PER STACK: 20/25/30
MOVEMENT PER STACK: 3%/4%/5%
STACK DURATION: 14
MAX STACKS: 5/6/7
lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
name: bristleback_warpath
